ValidationRule.description: Do not check off Payment Received for BOR policies. Need this rule to prevent invoices from being created in QBO.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Policy_Active__c && NOT(OR($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits", $RecordType.Name = "Scale", $RecordType.Name = "FS Direct", Override_Policy_VR__c = true)) &&
AND( ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c, "New Business - BOR"),
OR( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "In Processing"), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "In Stamping / Accounting"), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Policy Delivered / Closed Won") ),
Payment_Received__c = TRUE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Do not check off Payment Received for BOR policies.
